typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Key as string,
		title as string,
		value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> Journeystructurezebra
derivedColumn2 derive() ~> derivedColumn1
derivedColumn3 derive() ~> derivedColumn2
Journeystructurezebra derive() ~> derivedColumn3
